head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LITWIN, MILTON H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LITWIN, MILTON H.

block.p: LITWIN--Milton H. 92, Mendham. A true gentleman. Adoring husband of Sylvia. Dad of Lynn Ross, Larry, Ralph. Best grandpa of Sacha, Darah, Emil, Marissa, Eli, Melody. Services Monday, April 5, 10:30 am, Temple B'Nai Or, Morristown.
LITWIN--Milton. Dear Uncle, patriarch of our family, our father's brother and best friend. You will be missed. Jane and Ron Zimmerman and Family

LITWIN--Milton H. 92, Mendham. A true gentleman. Adoring husband of Sylvia. Dad of Lynn Ross, Larry, Ralph. Best grandpa of Sacha, Darah, Emil, Marissa, Eli, Melody. Services Monday, April 5, 10:30 am, Temple B'Nai Or, Morristown.
LITWIN--Milton. Dear Uncle, patriarch of our family, our father's brother and best friend. You will be missed. Jane and Ron Zimmerman and Family
